extendedInfo.description: Air hockey is a game for competing players (you and the computer) trying to score points in the opposing player's goal.We bring to you this blast game on Android whether you are young or old. There are three different difficulty levels for you to conquer: easy, medium and hard. Now join the game to practice your skills against the computer opponent for future World Championships. And you can submit your total scores to the online Leaderboard to compete with global players.

reviews.comment: It made a loud sound and froze his puck but I could move mine. I was able to close it though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sweet this is the best app for air hockey one player, but could we see more modes and options(like themes)? oh and if you do a two player mode please insure that it does not confuse the two pucks every single one I have tried if you cross the center line you can accidentally take control of the other players paddle which ruins two player mode, so just giving you a heads up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SPAMMED!
reviews.comment: UPDATE: I now find that after having this game on my phone, my email address is being hit by BADOO spam which originated from Air Hockey advertising from this free version.
